document_data.name: Kemp
document_data.mainbody: '''Kemp''' was the spokesperson of [[Targos]], one of the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]], during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He led the town through an invasion of barbarians from the [[Tribe of the Elk]] and the [[Battle of Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: Kemp was often cited as distrustful of visitors, and fiercely dedicated to the interests of his town, even over the interests of the Ten Towns as a whole.
document_data.History: Kemp led Targos through the Battle of Icewind Dale in the {{YearlinkName|1356}} and the reconstruction efforts thereafter, through to at least [[1364 DR]].<ref>
document_data.Relationships: He held a long standing suspicion against the [[halfling]] [[Regis]].
